Title: Preparations - Aragorn II
Text:
Aragorn can be found in the main house and Boromir can be found in one of the guest rooms along the road that winds up the southern slope of the Vale of Imladris.

Gandalf is on the second floor of the Last Homely House.

Aragorn has asked you to bring word of the two ways south he sees for the Company: by the Redhorn Gate over the mountains, or through the Gap of Rohan.
CompleteText: I do know of this third way, and Gandalf knows too that I am loathe to bring the Company through the mountains by that road.
